faq1.question: How to start using quantitative trading?
faq1.answer: After registering an account, you can choose a trading strategy that suits you, set parameters, and start automated trading.

faq2.question: How to choose trading strategies?
faq2.answer: We offer various strategies including arbitrage, hedging, and high-frequency trading. You can choose the strategy that best fits your risk preference and investment goals.

faq3.question: How to view trading records?
faq3.answer: You can view detailed trading records in your personal center, including transaction time, amount, and returns.

faq4.question: How to contact customer support?
faq4.answer: You can contact us through online chat, email, or phone. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

invite.title: Referral Program
invite.subtitle: Invite friends to join and earn up to 20% commission, enjoy permanent profit sharing
invite.description: Panda Quant's referral program helps you multiply your earnings. By inviting friends to join, you not only earn high commissions but also enjoy permanent profit sharing. Our multi-level profit sharing mechanism ensures continuous growth of your earnings.

benefits.description: Earn high commissions from friends' trading, 20% for first generation, 10% for second generation
Referral relationship is permanent, earn continuously with no time limit
Get 100 USDT for each friend registration, additional rewards for trading milestones

features: Secure and Reliable - Using blockchain technology to ensure transparent commission distribution
Team Support - Professional customer service available 24/7
Transparent Earnings - Real-time commission records, track your earnings anytime
Automatic Settlement - System automatically calculates and distributes commissions
Multi-level Sharing - Support multi-level referrals for continuous earnings growth

steps.title: Earn Commissions

questions.question: How are commissions calculated?
questions.answer: Commissions are calculated as a percentage of friends' trading volume, 20% for first generation, 10% for second generation, settled in real-time

questions.question: When do commissions arrive?
questions.answer: Commissions are calculated in real-time, settled daily, and credited the next day

questions.question: How to view commission records?
questions.answer: View detailed commission records in your personal center after logging in

questions.question: Is there a commission limit?
questions.answer: No commission limit, the more friends you invite, the more you earn
